definition: a board that is pulled by a speedboat as a person stands on it and skims over the top of the water, to ride on an aquaplane
details:
noun
- a board that is pulled by a speedboat as a person stands on it and skims over the top of the water
verb
- to ride on an aquaplane
= example: to ride on an aquaplane
- to rise up onto a thin film of water between the tires and road so that there is no more contact with the road
= example: to rise up onto a thin film of water between the tires and road so that there is no more contact with the road
